title: PM strongly condemns terrorist attack at Levies checkpost
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 21 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif strongly condemned the terrorist attack at a checkpost of the Levies force that martyred two personnel.
The prime minister said the nation paid tribute to its security forces for defending the country.
He prayed for the departed souls to rest in peace and for the early recovery of the injured.
